name: BotBrawl
description:
In BotBrawl you build vehicles of any kind, shape or size from blocks. You can choose from over 140 different modules. Use unique movement parts to make your vehicle suit your playstyle by using wheels, driftpads, screwdrives, thrusters, wings and more!

A unique weapon system with high customizability gives you additional freedom in choosing to play what you want:


We are currently working hard on making this game become complete. Currently you can download an alpha demo and try out the core game features there, including online multiplayer.

Join us on Discord! Discord will always have the newest information and gameversion available. You can also get in contact with us and the community there!

Leave us some comments with feedback and thoughts on this game!
